actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for interest on higher education loans and to permit penalty-free withdrawals from qualified retirement plans to pay for higher education expenses.

summary.text: Higher Education Finance Improvement Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for any interest on a qualified higher education loan. Exempts withdrawals from qualified retirement plans for qualified higher education expenses from the ten percent early withdrawal penalty.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the deduction for interest on higher education loans and to permit penalty-free withdrawals from qualified retirement plans to pay for higher education expenses.
